description: React component for an application tracking page with filters, sorting, editing statuses, and timeline management, including localStorage persistence.

methods.name: toSearchText
methods.description: Converts a value to a lowercase string for search purposes, handling null and undefined.

methods.name: toTime
methods.description: Parses an ISO date string to epoch milliseconds, returns NaN if invalid.

methods.name: uniqStrings
methods.description: Returns an array of unique, trimmed, lowercase strings from input array.

methods.name: isoToday
methods.description: Returns today's date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD).

methods.name: formatEventDate
methods.description: Formats a date string into a locale date string or returns a placeholder if invalid.

methods.name: ApplicationsPage
methods.description: Main React component for managing and displaying job applications with filters, editing, and timeline features.
